author: jakrypto.
content:
Hi I want to deploy a local devnet ideally with https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-deployment-ansible. But I get several errors via this repo it starts with version errors in requirements.yml (robertdebock.bootstrap) and ends with missing .yml's if try to playbook "deploy_devnet_from_scratch.yml"

What are the steps to make this happen, help appreciated

author: parithosh
content: Hey! I'm working on an updated guide for using the repo, I think we fixed the `robertdebock.bootstrap` version error (i hope i remembered to push it). I'll DM you the half completed docs in the meantime ðŸ˜„
